headline: good2grow Partners with Corrao Group for Salesforce TPM Implementation
summary: - Corrao Group, a leading global Salesforce consulting firm specializing in Retail and Consumer Goods, announced today that good2grow, a fast-growing leader in better-for-you kids' beverages, has been working with Corrao Group to implement Salesforce Trade Promotion Management (TPM) as part of its continued investment in operational excellence and retail expansion. The project, which will go live in January 2026, demonstrates how consumer goods companies can rapidly deploy enterprise-grade TPM c

headline: Huge Insider Buying in MGM and Salesforce
summary: As the year winds down, insiders make huge buys in MGM Resorts and Salesforce. However, those were not the only notable instances of insider buying seen recently.

headline: Carbon Footprint Management Market Set to Reach USD 38.14 Billion by 2030 with a 20.4% CAGR
summary: Estimated to grow from USD 15.07 billion in 2025 to USD 38.14 billion by 2030, the carbon footprint management market is set for a CAGR of 20.4%. Key drivers include government carbon emission initiatives, rising industrial energy consumption, and an increased focus on sustainability reporting. The manufacturing sector is predicted to grow rapidly due to environmental regulations. Cloud technology will dominate by 2030, offering scalability and flexibility. headline: AI tools could drive $263 billion in holiday sales. Walmart and Target are racing to get in
summary: Consumers are turning to AI chatbots like ChatGPT for gift discovery, reviews and price matching, potentially driving billions in sales this holiday season.

headline: Movate Acquires Solomo to Strengthen Salesforce and AI Capabilities in Healthcare
summary: Movate, a global leader in digital technology and customer experience (CX) services, today announced the acquisition of Solomo, a premier Salesforce, data and AI consulting company with deep specialization in the healthcare sector. This strategic move positions Movate well to significantly enhance its capabilities in delivering AI-driven platform solutions and strengthening its position within the Salesforce ecosystem.
